title: HELP!! NEW CLIENT DOWNLOADING MORE THAN 12GB!!!
body: As the title said. I had to reinstall league due to some technical difficulty, and when i tries to reinstall it first said that it will download ~8gb which was fine by me. But then i tried to upgrade it to the new client and it is downloading 13600 MB with an eta of 12 hours(slightly slow net). Is this normal? Is there any other way?

replies.body: The legacy client will try to download our updated client as part of it's normal patching process. You don't necessarily have to _use_ the updated client, but you will need to let it finish that download before it will let you login.
Oh, ok then. Guess i'll have to wait a little. Thanks
league is a big game. its normal mate. my league is around 12gigs as well
That's what I feared..{{champion:32}} Thanks anyways.
